enhanced_by.reason: Both methods initialize a Safelist with a similar set of tags and attributes, making it easier to reuse setup code.
Both methods involve adding tags to the Safelist, which can be tested for consistency in setup.
Both methods involve adding attributes to specific tags, which can be tested for correct attribute assignment.
The method can be used to validate that the tags added by 'relaxed' are correctly recognized as safe.
The method can be used to validate that the attributes added by 'relaxed' are correctly recognized as safe.
The method can be used to validate that the enforced attributes added by 'relaxed' are correctly set.
